        @ResponseBody
@RequestMapping(value="/application/createDashboard",
                method=POST)
private java.lang.String createDashboard(@ModelAttribute(value="ACCOUNT_ID")
                                                           int accountId,
                                                           @ModelAttribute(value="USER_ID")
                                                           int userId,
                                                           @ModelAttribute(value="dashboardForm")
                                                           DashboardForm form,
                                                           org.springframework.validation.BindingResult result,
                                                           @RequestParam(value="name",defaultValue="")

        Create a new dashboard
        Parameters:
        accountId - - current account Id
        userId - - current User Id
        name - - Name given to the newly created dashboard

      • removeDashboard

        @ResponseBody
@RequestMapping(value="/application/deleteDashboard",
                method=POST)
private java.lang.String removeDashboard(@ModelAttribute(value="USER_ID")
                                                           int userId,
                                                           @RequestParam(value="dashboardId")
                                                           int dashboardId)
        Delete a dashboard. Could delete any dashboard in account.
        Parameters:
        userId - - current User Id
        dashboardId - - Id of dashboard to be deleted.
